text: Ropica albomaculata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Pic in 1945BioLib.cz - Ropica albomaculata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. in Vietnam.Laminares du Monde ==References== Category:Ropica (genus) Category:Beetles described in 1945
title: Ropica albomaculata
